elements.2211.03256_839aef3c050a5ca45710360b0545b: We present a dataset generator engine named
elements.2211.03256_bed803bc4925ae4cce7cb47a0a800: Webvicob can readily construct a large-scale visual corpus (i.e., images with text annotations) from a raw Wikipedia HTML dump
elements.2211.03256_2539b717ad34f72f8f3e084fceab7: In this report, we validate that Webvicob-generated data can cover a wide range of context and knowledge and helps practitioners to build a powerful Visual Document Understanding (VDU) backbone
elements.2211.03256_efbcbefc5a51dbb9f6c5d8b2f9955: The proposed engine is publicly available at
elements.2211.03256_0f821a9efa61a7aba59a96da3262e: Language modeling has been a long-standing fundamental task in natural language processing (NLP)
elements.2211.03256_0a0d69c8d01a8df924c47dd9995e4: The trained language models (LMs) are utilized in a range of downstream NLP applications, such as information extraction (IE)
elements.2211.03256_165669881acb4332de27c66c02f0b: To build a powerful LM, recent methods utilize large-scale text corpus at the pretraining phase
elements.2211.03256_2aca5fc38b7ccdbb21d3d1cba198c: The text corpus is generally constructed with a specialized engine or software
elements.2211.03256_183576713cb5613a44f1f5cbe60ed: extracts texts from Wikipedia HTML dumps and builds a clean text corpus.
elements.2211.03256_4e95cb5de890549ee4f2e26ae11e4: has been developed to conduct a wide range of real-world tasks on document images
elements.2211.03256_3c73bc8b922242788681749ff4839: aims to extract some key texts from a document image
elements.2211.03256_6c2f40d1680fcef133774507a53dc: Most recent VDU backbones can be regarded as an extension of LM
elements.2211.03256_77a15dab73df5b5cbf8671bcf5221: Inspired by recent advances in LMs
elements.2211.03256_eb8a7038ccb6ef0eb4d742ad5a483: , recent VDU methods share a similar approach that (1) it first collects large-scale real document images, (2) conducts OCR on the images to extract texts, and (3) trains a BERT-like LM backbone on the extracted texts
elements.2211.03256_1841ed48e623c1a72495f397be97d: Although conventional VDU methods have shown promising results, several practical challenges exist, especially in the training dataset preparation phase
elements.2211.03256_2c3ecef7519686a1397fa5e87236d: rely on a large-scale real image dataset
elements.2211.03256_2403e29c942c14d49537f83f989ab: consists of 11M industrial document images and is utilized in a range of VDU works
elements.2211.03256_641ad29fc1dc3dca6973a414799fd: However, in most low-resourced languages, there is no public dataset like IIT-CDIP
elements.2211.03256_c7e6c4ccfdc2a693dffdf6e29cfd7: In addition, off-the-shelf OCR engines (e.g., CLOVA OCR API,
elements.2211.03256_5ec3080ad5708868426069a480f15: ) are required to extract texts in the pre-processing
elements.2211.03256_11fc2916aca912d88c775362f3542: Moreover, the use of OCR raises other negative ramifications; the constructed data is strongly tied to the OCR engine, and OCR errors are propagated throughout the process
elements.2211.03256_0e86deaf2a92fd96ee20e246b1292: This problem becomes severe, especially in some non-Latin languages such as Korean and Japanese, where OCR is known to be complicated
elements.2211.03256_b8b79aca74ec58550568423b3cfdb: In this work, we propose an engine for building a web-based visual corpus
elements.2211.03256_3288e095428a8b974e24f72b60b3c: The proposed Web-based Visual Corpus Builder (Webvicob) renders a web page into an image file and generates rich text annotations (See Figure
elements.2211.03256_0db40a6bd7da70588f77ff99513f6: With expressive Document Object Model (DOM) APIs, Webvicob produces accurate bounding boxes for all characters
elements.2211.03256_1e04549f7cb78b6e462273a29914c: As can be seen in Figure
elements.2211.03256_e1e04849d5172dc7ac38d0818bc92: , Webvicob covers a wide range of word contexts
elements.2211.03256_977386adb60739480fbda2a20f0c7: More visualization results are also available in Appendix
elements.2211.03256_2de834438a55bacd2a20315bb9716: Compared to the traditional model trained on IIT-CDIP, the Webvicob-trained model shows a comparable result on DocVQA Task 1 and a higher score
elements.2211.03256_152c3ccf13f7e806151e743e6aaa8: on Task 3, showing the effectiveness of the de-biased Webvicob-based visual corpora
elements.2211.03256_41498fad0389a24eae6cfda6fb7c2: The proposed method is simple yet effective
elements.2211.03256_ce5741649c2bd06b0bd7e8ec511c1: We show that the Webvicob-generated corpus can be critical in building a powerful VDU backbone
elements.2211.03256_559ff529f10b689bf3c02eb5132d4: Through extensive experiments and analysis, we show the effectiveness of Webvicob
elements.2211.03256_2529b9431af7ff47804cb592e77af: The contributions of this work can be summarized as follows:
elements.2211.03256_08822b5e47878eb32473b32d9e351: We propose Webvicob, which can be used for pretraining the visual document understanding models.
elements.2211.03256_43910330854954977df1c822f9c75: We conduct extensive experiments to verify the effectiveness of the proposed engine and dataset.
elements.2211.03256_4f762a971bb84ffd524dce8693d45: The source code of our engine is publicly available for reproducibility and enhancement.

elements.2211.03256_19a84296beaaa2e851e69535399de: In this section, we introduce a traditional VDU pipeline and datasets
elements.2211.03256_37a846c694ad45f47ea5ff1c03b7a: Most of the current methods share a similar approach of (1) collecting large-scale real images, (2) conducting OCR on the images, and (3) training a BERT-like backbone on the extracted texts
elements.2211.03256_cfbf7ff5a33ce07041f0998a6e474: and the recent advancements in language modeling, a range of BERT-like Transformer-based VDU backbones has been proposed
elements.2211.03256_efd924c0521c625f44f8252d00669: For handling layout information of document images, spatial coordinates of OCR text boxes are fed to the VDU backbone
elements.2211.03256_5f5796e955fc3768cd1ee24e80112: , visual features of an input image are also being incorporated into the recent VDU backbones
elements.2211.03256_a13a41536cd21859e93b9ceec20b5: More recently, with the advances in Vision Transformer (ViT)
elements.2211.03256_fa13bb73d5b732c5678f040486e96: , training a Transformer encoder-decoder VDU backbone without OCR has also been attempted
elements.2211.03256_d57fe4fef127368183a017a13a752: Our engine can be used together in various VDU backbones
elements.2211.03256_53862c7d85e277728fb3c04635e1a: In this paper, we verified the performance of the Webvicob engine by pretraining BROS and LayoutXLM.
elements.2211.03256_4353c9bf0041ee15a08a851168c79: Most existing OCR annotated datasets have small sizes, leading to difficulties in training VDU backbones
elements.2211.03256_c55e8a707fff6c2809a3d53cbdea5: To construct a rich corpus, in the traditional pipeline, large-scale real-world document images (e.g., IIT-CDIP) and an OCR engine (e.g., CLOVA OCR API
elements.2211.03256_560d7e5ec25b0c6d10a0e25179387: The quality of the OCR engine significantly affects the downstream processes
elements.2211.03256_da99afffecd9650b6f2fcb25243f3: Hence, there have been difficulties in training and testing the VDU backbone
elements.2211.03256_9a88bd131831090216a15c951445f: use different in-house OCRs, it has been difficult to make a fair comparison
elements.2211.03256_af3c5e03623f01926563d11d2d05f: collects large-scale digital-born PDF data from the world wide web and extracts text annotations from the PDF via an open-source PDF renderer.
elements.2211.03256_7caabc0f26f26e02ee3c6b71f83d1: Although this showed another promising direction, it is not easy to follow the pipeline in practice
elements.2211.03256_49450222b4559af15f16ddc09e822: A practitioner has to collect the PDF data as there is no publicly available dataset (
elements.2211.03256_925d41c8dd6e075099c2a38660650: Moreover, since pdf files cannot easily be editable, augmentation is limited
elements.2211.03256_e1cc8a8c420fe763ae52a833db153: Unlike the existing approach, Webvicob can efficiently modify and augment data (i.e., layout, background image) with javascript as Webvicob renders HTML directly
elements.2211.03256_e7611f2cc8d15835d450e50a2da01: Moreover, Webvicob can easily be incorporated with the HTML dumps (e.g., Wikipedia dumps
elements.2211.03256_787e08f43a6ff08bc9fc0349ad6cd: ), which are easily accessible and have been widely used in building powerful NLP backbones
elements.2211.03256_e59a6a328e2085f32d1b7ea61be72: Webvicob uses HTML dumps and modifies Document Object Model (DOM) to generate data for pretraining VDU backbones with rich corpora
elements.2211.03256_8ad4f5e0d348a1eb8d8c6166ab2e9: , Webvicob provides box annotations of characters, words, LaTeX

elements.2211.03256_bbf4e6ba8eebbca25e43a0acf603b: Our initial goal was to handle tons of HTML data, such as Common Crawl dataset.
elements.2211.03256_7b9ebed6a87d4d19e279eade19784: However, the massive variety in the HTML format made it difficult to design an integrated solution
elements.2211.03256_63b2c11b3cb269b18499e7492ccdd: Currently, Webvicob is only specialized in a Wikipedia format
elements.2211.03256_d068fff561d5c31fb1d1af9628265: Expanding the scope could be future work
elements.2211.03256_b9f399a06a67ee50fde3a7c46d147: We expect Webvicob to easily be integrated with any augmentation project, such as Augraphy
elements.2211.03256_83381daf6c3115f7cb1a8839a4724: In this work, we propose an engine, Webvicob, that builds visual corpora from web resources
elements.2211.03256_d94e1c1c19ceaf1df3901cdad12ad: The constructed visual corpora can be utilized in building VDU backbones
elements.2211.03256_4ebb38e1f7fd6b311e24303d1f6bb: In our experiments and analyses, we observe that the Webvicob-generated data helps the VDU backbone robust on various document formats and domains
elements.2211.03256_e95af5bb67b9cd639d83751f76ae7: The source code of Webvicob is available at GitHub.
elements.2211.03256_7ad0d7ac2af40aaffa4d31e349785: The authors thank NAVER CLOVA Text Vision Team and Information Extraction Team.
elements.2211.03256_646cc47187789d5a9d3544928b2eb: Example data of Webvicob produced are shown in Figure
elements.2211.03256_7eca326f9842c62370781b00e6306: Combining Webvicob and Augraphy can generate various synthetic documents with rich visual effects.
elements.2211.03256_02d2f596356ac9c2b8ab62afaa87b: We sampled 3,626 data from each of the four datasets (Webvicob, IIT-CDIP, DocVQA Task 1, DocVQA Task 3) and made 14504 vectors for PCA
elements.2211.03256_fa6758eb2dbbfb5f4ce958332815a: We construct a 100,000 word vocabulary using Wikipedia 1M data and use Bag Of Words (BOW) to get representations
elements.2211.03256_bdb11e413429022a90046646eb79b: row show the analysis between the
elements.2211.03256_ed0c820e95ac175364aad2b28bed2: row is a plot using the
elements.2211.03256_924d337386a22d8bd8350001019ee: We performed visualization using a total of 10 principal components
elements.2211.03256_8420728fb7aa6010c8a3728a8bd13: IIT-CDIP and DocVQA Task 1 have very similar BOW vectors, and Webvicob contains all of the various BOW vectors.
elements.2211.03256_79bcfba9a293472b33e5ebc5ed584: In recent years, research on visual document understanding (VDU) has grown significantly, with a particular emphasis on the development of self-supervised learning methods
elements.2211.03256_d1391a298b4fde0dd093411579757: However, one of the significant challenges faced in this field is the limited availability of publicly accessible visual corpora or extensive collections of images with detailed text annotations, particularly for non-Latin or resource-scarce languages
elements.2211.03256_30d37623751865143cd1bb757ca25: To address this challenge, we propose Web-based Visual Corpus Builder (Webvicob), a dataset generator engine capable of constructing large-scale, multilingual visual corpora from raw Wikipedia HTML dumps
elements.2211.03256_2f909f3dd3c8c4adcba227ca3637b: Our experiments demonstrate that the data generated by Webvicob can be used to train robust VDU models that perform well on various downstream tasks, such as DocVQA and post-OCR parsing
elements.2211.03256_c0e795f15a6e14e4bf6b1d8eca9f6: Furthermore, when using a dataset of 1 million images generated by Webvicob, we observed an improvement of over 13
elements.2211.03256_e42933214c3e721b475e2ed915937: on the DocVQA Task 3 compared to a dataset of 11 million images from the IIT-CDIP
elements.2211.03256_9f2a367d1b286fcb57f91db8593bc: The implementation of our engine is publicly available on
elements.2211.03256_46651adb1f8e080a6afb3d7188160: extracts texts from Wikipedia HTML dumps and builds a clean text corpus
elements.2211.03256_ead0477f4b5a6af7c4d6b30de074c: Most recent VDU backbones can be regarded as an extension of LM.
elements.2211.03256_d69fdb95dd7ef5352444aefec94b8: Moreover, using OCR can have other negative consequences; the constructed data is strongly tied to the OCR engine, and OCR errors are propagated throughout the process
elements.2211.03256_98d5b85f95cd72a9d2db3a617348f: , the proposed Web-based Visual Corpus Builder (Webvicob) renders a web page into an image file and generates rich text annotations
elements.2211.03256_c5ae0c023793a580f59f7d2e5970d: Moreover, Webvicob covers a wide range of word contexts

elements.2211.03256_50b0bf5928b92f58ec0a95c1163eb: The results of PCA analysis on 3,626 samples are available in Section
elements.2211.03256_ab8614320e8e0bf023f7b220be2a8: Compared to the traditional model trained on IIT-CDIP, the Webvicob-trained model shows a competitive result on DocVQA Task 1 and a higher score
elements.2211.03256_5bba88f88d3d17469c7bbdc2804dc: We show that the Webvicob-generated corpus is critical in building a powerful VDU backbone
elements.2211.03256_4d3088d4ffeee072fc4ab2e69d39d: Through extensive experiments and analyses, we show the effectiveness of Webvicob
elements.2211.03256_147388372933a6a0f1eec10411c78: We propose Webvicob, which can be used for pretraining the visual document understanding models
elements.2211.03256_38f5fc2783b8f40299dbc55094b65: Webvicob provides rich annotations, including character, word, line, and paragraph information.
elements.2211.03256_723214939748375b463dbcb1a0a69: Webvicob provides support for a wide range of fonts, allowing visual documents with identical content to appear differently
elements.2211.03256_f273d1fbd99487b843d5b1822912d: Additionally, we have taken into account the characteristics of each font to construct precise character-level bounding box annotations.
elements.2211.03256_c348f120ee6ff6137414f88cff01e: The source code of our engine is publicly available to promote research on VDUs in low-resource languages.
elements.2211.03256_2ca4146312f1c35aab12ec7715420: and the recent advancements in language modeling, a range of BERT-like Transformer-based VDU backbones have been proposed

elements.2211.03256_2e2e4b0613630a7a026dec5f1c1da: GPU training days compared to the Donut
elements.2211.03256_38f74dd61f76152feefb38b8d4243: While SynthDoG also made use of the Wikipedia corpus, the outstanding performance of Webvicob-generated data is noteworthy
elements.2211.03256_32e53180da04f47edb2e2e9db80eb: We speculate that there are two reasons for this
elements.2211.03256_c3634ea94d7b50e454dc41ef47a01: First, the presence of text and images that are contextually relevant in Webvicob helps to accurately reflect the relationship between images and text
elements.2211.03256_6eb0b2a32feccdd66b71370b5308e: Second, the use of various types of real documents, such as tables, in the learning process can implicitly improve the learning of semantic information, such as key-value pairing.
elements.2211.03256_b967ee4a9eeaeccadfbf909d2c75d: Our initial goal was to handle tons of HTML data, such as CommonCrawl dataset
elements.2211.03256_58ef22440ca04f347f1a99e34799c: which consists of petabytes of data
elements.2211.03256_271fc5fbfc063b1023fb1bf7f3844: Expanding the scope could be future work.
elements.2211.03256_f49c7d6852665026c7e9987d47385: , combining Webvicob and Augraphy can generate document images with rich visual effects.
elements.2211.03256_5adf019b507b21953c962326a8fe2: We sampled 3,626 data points from each of the four datasets (Webvicob, IIT-CDIP, DocVQA Task 1, and DocVQA Task 3), creating a total of 14,504 vectors for PCA analysis
elements.2211.03256_64c2d20b7e8a99a77e1f28fa34b44: We constructed a vocabulary of 100,000 words using Wikipedia 1M data and represented the data using Bag of Words (BOW) representation, excluding stop words
elements.2211.03256_c126543c8ef922b9be9c9dfd7719b: row display the analysis between the
elements.2211.03256_75ac97fef65241103adfcb00f61d1: For example, the first row shows the plot of the
elements.2211.03256_f48e49783726118d1243c035a3db9: We visualized the data using 10 principal components and found that the BOW vectors of IIT-CDIP and DocVQA Task 1 are very similar, while Webvicob contains a diverse range of BOW vectors
elements.2211.03256_3a1b3cc3ed1c40e786eab8e172c1b: In our experiments and analyses, we observe that the Webvicob-generated data helps the VDU backbone perform robustly across a variety of document formats and domains.
